entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning in the evening. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 35 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
